item.title: Networking Notes
item.description: tag-notestag-tutorial Calculating Packet delay Suppose within your Web browser you click on a link to obtain a Web page. The IP address for the associated URL is not cached in your local host, so a DNS lookup is necessary to obtain the IP address.
